title: Pork, leek and apricot raised pie with cider and sage jelly
description: Make your own pork pie with a delicious twist – the jelly is infused with cider and sage and served alongside.
ingredients: 300ml/10fl oz dry cider (this needs to be fizzy)
400g/14oz pork shoulder, fat trimmed, cut into 1.5cm/½in chunks
425g/15oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
½ tsp freshly ground black pepper
50g/2oz chilled butter, cut into cubes, plus extra, softened, for greasing
